channel.title: csharp on Radu Matei's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in csharp on Radu Matei's Blog

item.title: Writing controllers for Kubernetes CRDs with C#
item.description: The goal of this article is to show you how to use the Kubernetes C# client to write extremely simple controllers for your Kubernetes custom resources, and start watching resources in a few lines of C#
